title: Geo Circle
description: A circular region of a particular radius centered on a GeoCoordinate. Based on [schema.org](http://schema.org/GeoCircle)

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: The unique identifier of the circle.

schema:description.title: Description
schema:description.description: A description of what the circle contains.

schema:radius.title: Radius
schema:radius.description: The length of the radius of the circle. This value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
